projects.title: Airtktclub - Booking Platform
projects.description: An online flight booking platform enabling users to search and book flights with features like rescheduling, baggage options, and printable e-tickets.
projects.longDescription: Airtktclub is a comprehensive flight booking platform where users can search for flights based on locations, dates, and passenger count. The platform includes an admin panel to manage bookingsâ€”such as rescheduling, changing seats, and adding baggage. Built with React.js and Bootstrap, the site ensures smooth UI performance and responsive design.
features: Search and book flights with dynamic filters
Admin panel for rescheduling, cancellations, and seat changes
projects.challenges: Ensuring responsive performance while dealing with complex UI logic was a challenge. Used optimized component rendering and efficient state management to solve this.
projects.role: Frontend developer responsible for building and optimizing booking and admin features.

projects.title: S1L Mortgage Tools
projects.description: A set of online tools for mortgage, refinance, and HELOC calculations, enhancing financial decision-making for users.
projects.longDescription: Developed for Synergy One Lending, this project includes calculators for Mortgage, Home Refinance, and HELOC. It supports users in making informed financial decisions. The tools were built using React.js with MUI and deployed on Azure.
features: Interactive mortgage, refinance, and HELOC calculators
Data input validation and real-time results
projects.challenges: Ensuring precise financial logic and intuitive UI was challenging. Collaborated with clients to validate formulas and improve usability.
projects.role: Frontend developer responsible for tool development, UI/UX design, and client interaction.

projects.title: Study Metro - Education Platform
projects.description: A platform helping international students search and apply to global universities.
projects.longDescription: Study Metro is an online admission platform aimed at connecting students with universities across the globe. Built using React and Redux, it features reusable UI components, dynamic search filtering, and smooth API integration for real-time data fetching.
projects.challenges: Managing real-time data and user search filtering efficiently required careful design of API calls and component reusability.
projects.role: Frontend intern focused on building reusable components and implementing data-driven search functionality.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with React and Bootstrap, featuring smooth animations and a clean design.
projects.longDescription: This portfolio website showcases my skills and projects in an interactive and engaging way. Built with React and Bootstrap, it features smooth animations powered by Framer Motion, responsive design, and a clean, modern UI. The site includes sections for projects, skills, and contact information, all wrapped in a beautiful, user-friendly interface.
features: Responsive design that works seamlessly across all devices
Smooth animations and transitions using Framer Motion
Interactive project showcase with detailed modals
projects.challenges: One of the main challenges was implementing smooth animations while maintaining performance. I solved this by using Framer Motion's optimized animation system and implementing proper code splitting. Another challenge was creating a responsive design that looks great on all devices, which I addressed using Bootstrap's grid system and custom media queries.
projects.role: Full-stack developer responsible for design, development, and deployment. Implemented all features and animations, ensuring optimal performance and user experience.
